mapper.select: SELECT v_no as vNo, v_title as vTitle, v_description as vDescription, v_upload_date as vUploadDate, v_views as vViews, v_likes as vLikes, v_hates as vHates, v_instructor as vInstructor, v_instructor_intro as vInstructorIntro, v_category_name as vCategoryName, saved_no as savedNo FROM videos ORDER BY v_no DESC
